MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 21-OCT-2020 09:45.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the KY10 postcode area of Crail. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 06:06am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the fault  and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 09:45am. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:09am on the 21st of October 2020
